sentences.sContent: Influencing the local press has always been part of ISI operations, usually through bribes, blandishments or intimidation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Influencing the local press has always been part of ISI operations, usually through bribes, blandishments or intimidation.
sentences.sCn: 给当地媒体施压也是情报局经常做的事，通常通过行贿、哄骗或胁迫影响媒体。
